@carrier-logo-height: 33px;
@carrier-logo-width: 44px;

.itemResultsCard() {
    @arrow-size     : 10px;
    @font-size-xxs  : 10px;
    @line-height-xxs: 12px;

    .itemResultsCard {
        border: 1px solid @color-neutral-md-light;
        color : @color-black;

        // Card Layout Sections
        .itemSummary {
            .display-inline-block();
            float: left;
            width: 70%;
        }
    }
}
